channel.title: How do i make shops sell items for something other than coins?
channel.description: Hey I was wondering how can I make a shop sell items using something other than coins? Like another tokkul shop for instance, how would i make it so the shop will sell for tokkul? I have tried it before and it said what the item was worth in coins and tokkul, so it didn't really work. Please help, and thanks.

item.title: How do i make shops sell items for something other than coins?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

if (MyShopID == #) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd); }

I’m pretty sure thats it, just change the number

this is under:

} else if (interfaceID == 3900) { // Show value to buy items int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(removeID, 0, removeSlot)); String ShopAdd = ""; 
			if ((ShopValue >= 1000) && (ShopValue < 1000000)) {
				ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
			} else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
				ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)";
			}</blockquote>

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make shops sell items for something other than coins?
